Lyric:
[by:鬼魅游天]
[00:13.60]I'm gonna love ya
[00:15.48]I wish you were my first love
[00:17.24]We fell in love
[00:18.56]Fall in love
[00:20.75]Drunk in love
[00:23.30]Wave after wave
[00:25.10]I don't know where the lights are taking us
[00:27.45]And I'll write your name
[00:27.53]I will never let you down
[00:29.94]I'm only human
[00:30.35]I'm all about that bass, ‘bout that bass, no treble
[00:33.26]I'm all about that (3), ‘bout that (2), ‘bout that (1), ‘bout that

[00:36.66]POP DANTHOLOGY

[00:38.50]I stay up too late
[00:40.88]Got nothing in my brain
[00:43.49]That's what people say
[00:46.12]That's what people say (it might seem crazy what I'm about to say)
[00:49.81]You're like a drug that's killing me
[00:52.71]I cut you out entirely
[00:55.18]But I get so high when I'm inside you

[00:59.61]Because I'm happy
[01:01.10]Clap along if you feel like a room without a roof

[01:05.84]Clap along if you feel like happiness is the truth
[01:09.73]Because I'm happy
[01:11.80]Clap along if you know what happiness is to you
[01:15.18]Because I'm happy
[01:16.33]Clap along if you feel like that's what you wanna do (following, following, following)

[01:20.73]You say I'm crazy
[01:25.81]‘Cause you don't think I know what you've done (these girls ain't loyal)
[01:31.33]But when you call me baby
[01:36.41]I know I'm not the only one

[01:50.86]Talk dirty to me

[02:01.80]Turn down for what

[02:04.22]I can read your body language

[02:08.76]Ah la la la

[02:12.57]Leggo

[02:21.57]What are you gonna do
[02:23.30]This is how we do
[02:26.26]So what are you gonna do
[02:28.70]This is how we do

[02:31.63]You know the words to my songs
[02:33.77]No habla ingles
[02:35.97]Girls hit your hallelujah
[02:37.91]Girls hit your hallelujah
[02:40.32]Our conversations ain't long
[02:42.82]But you know what is
[02:45.40]Girls hit your hallelujah
[02:47.17]‘Cause Uptown Funk gon' give it to ya
[02:49.37]‘Cause Uptown Funk gon' give it to ya
[02:51.68]‘Cause Uptown Funk gon' give it to ya
[02:54.10]Saturday night and we in the spot
[02:56.15]Don't believe me just watch

[03:01.50]Oh oh oh ooh oh

[03:04.17]Don't believe me just watch

[03:06.28]Louder

[03:09.55]Sing

[03:12.14]I'm so confused

[03:15.28]‘Cause all of me
[03:18.44]Loves all of you
[03:20.66]Love never felt so good
[03:22.40]She came to give it to you

[03:23.57]Say it ain't what you do cause…
[03:25.21](Oh my gosh, look at her butt)

[03:30.24]So if you knew what I knew
[03:34.35]She'd be yours tonight
[03:36.72](Look at her butt)

[03:39.37]Now I've got you in my space
[03:42.90]I won't let go of you (hey)

[03:45.71]When you say you love me
[03:50.40]Know I love you more
[03:54.12]And when you say you need me
[03:57.20]Know I need you more

[04:01.00](There's no going back)

[04:02.63]Say something, I'm giving up on you
[04:05.58]Yeah, you never said a word
[04:07.66]You didn't send me no letter
[04:09.77]I'm sorry that I couldn't get to you (you)
[04:12.78]Why you gotta be so rude?
[04:17.36]Been trying so hard not to let it show
[04:21.74]Nobody else needs to know
[04:23.96]If one thing I know, I'll fall but I'll grow
[04:27.24]I'm walking down this road of mine, this road that I call home
[04:30.65]So am I wrong

[04:31.32]Boy, when you're with me
[04:32.76]I'll give you a taste
[04:34.76]Make it like your birthday everyday
[04:37.31]I wanna be like Kanye
[04:40.39]Do what I want, I'll have it my way
[04:43.99]Yeah no matter what you say

[04:45.36]I know you like it sweet
[04:47.23]So you can have your cake
[04:49.11]Give you something good to celebrate
[04:51.80]I wanna be like Kanye
[04:54.65]Kanye, yeah yeah-ah, yeah-ah

[05:00.50]Bang bang into the room
[05:02.32]Can't remember to forget you
[05:03.83]Bang bang all over you
[05:05.73]Yeah you always make me go
[05:07.62]Like Kanye
[05:08.45]You're just a hideaway
[05:09.82]Kanye, yeah yeah-ah, yeah-ah

[05:14.98]This is the part when I say I don't want ya
[05:20.18]Big, big booty
[05:20.91]What you got a big booty
[05:22.28]I'm bringing booty back

[05:23.68]This is the part when I break free
[05:27.23]Don't blame it on me
[05:28.20]There's no place I'd rather be
[05:29.80]Oh won't you stay with me
[05:31.41]I tried to let it go
[05:32.95]Let it go, let it go
[05:36.00]I tried to let it go

[05:37.14]Everybody wanna steal my girl

[05:41.53]Yeah yeah-ah, yeah-ah
